price: And We taught him[33] the art of making coats of mail for you to protect yourselves in your battle. Will you then be grateful?
arabic: وَعَلَّمۡنَٰهُ صَنۡعَةَ لَبُوسٖ لَّكُمۡ لِتُحۡصِنَكُم مِّنۢ بَأۡسِكُمۡۖ فَهَلۡ أَنتُمۡ شَٰكِرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
